comment: Lagrange's theorem for Groups: the order of any subgroup of a finite group is a divisor of the order of the group. This is Metamath 100 proof #71. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jul-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)
